summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Prana Guru spiritual companion app with newly implemented astrology, meditation, calendar, and voice features. All backend APIs are working perfectly (100% success rate). Tested 19 different endpoint categories including full Vedic astrology calculations, meditation recommendations, festival calendar, and voice language support.
passed_tests: Root endpoint and basic API functionality
AI chat functionality with Gemini 3 Flash (POST /api/chat)
Kundali generation with complete birth chart calculations (POST /api/astrology/kundali)
Daily horoscope generation for all rashis (GET /api/astrology/daily/{index})
Complete rashi and nakshatra data (GET /api/astrology/rashis, GET /api/astrology/nakshatras)
Meditation sessions and stress-specific recommendations (GET /api/meditation/sessions, GET /api/meditation/recommend/{mood})
Festival calendar with monthly filtering (GET /api/calendar/festivals, GET /api/calendar/festivals?month=3)
Today's panchang information with tithi calculation (GET /api/calendar/today)
Voice language support for 10 Indian languages (GET /api/voice/languages)
Admin statistics and conversation management (GET /api/admin/stats, GET /api/admin/conversations)
